title: BuzzFeed Adds to C-Suite Following Public Market Debut
sub_head: The company named Complex Networks CEO Christian Baesler as its new chief operating officer, with oversight of all revenue functions
body:
BuzzFeed Inc. is reorganizing its top ranks after its merger with Complex Networks, as the newly public digital media company tries to win over investors.
The company has appointed Complex Networks Chief Executive Christian Baesler as its new chief operating officer, with oversight of all revenue functions. Mr. Baesler will continue to serve as CEO of Complex Networks. The company also elevated Complexâ€™s chief revenue officer, Edgar Hernandez, to the same position at BuzzFeed.
